name: Kafra Summer Cone
description: Hot summer days, only the chill, sweet ice cream cone will keep me going! After using, gain DOUBLE Base and Job exp from killing monsters in the wild. (Under Dead or non-combat state will cost buff time, Offline will not cost buff time)

name: Kafra Summer cone Blueprint
description: Those friends who love to prank dumped the Cone on my head!! But I'm not mad at all, it was Soooo chill.

name: Kafra Teleport Ticket
description: Kafra's special ticket can help deliver adventurers to anywhere on the continent free of charge. When adventurers own this ticket, it will be used as a priority. If you look carefully, Some vague words are written on the left bottom-"miss you."

name: Kaho’s Protection
description: The protection of the Flame Lord is certainly strong, for with it adventurers can take risks in the winter without wearing a coat.

name: Kaho’s Protection Blueprint
description: The protection of the Flame Lord is certainly strong, for with it adventurers can take risks in the winter without wearing a coat.

name: Katana
description: The Katana carried on the back. Although it is used as a decoration, it can still make people get frightened.

name: Katana Blueprint
description: The Katana carried on the back. Although it is used as a decoration, it can still make people get frightened.

name: Katar
description: The Katars made in the need of convenient action.

name: Katar of Frozen Icicle [2]
description: It is cold and sharp. The Katars with Water Attributes is made of ice crystal and has a certain probability to keep the enemy frozen.

name: Katar of Frozen Icicle [3]
description: It is cold and sharp. The Katars with Water Attributes is made of ice crystal and has a certain probability to keep the enemy frozen.

name: Katar of Piercing Wind [2]
description: The Katars with Wind Attributes is made of wind crystal and has a certain probability to keep the enemy sleeping.

name: Katar of Piercing Wind [3]
description: Wind Katar made of wind crystal, using this item has is a certain chance that set enemy into sleep.

name: Katar of Quaking [1]
description: A Katars made of sharp thorn bush has a certain probability to keep the enemy in a state of trance.
